.. _`twoBitInfo`:

TWOBITINFO
==========

Generate *.chorom.sizes file by *.2bit file (see http://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/admin/exe/linux.x86_64/FOOTER.txt)






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule twoBitInfo:
        input:
            "{sample}.2bit"
        output:
            "{sample}.chrom.sizes"
        log:
            "logs/{sample}.chrom.sizes.log"
        params:
            "" # optional params string
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/ucsc/twoBitInfo"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
